short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically login into your chalkpad account on website open

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No need to login manually each time on Chitkara University's erp system 'Chalkpad'. You can save your credentials in this extension and after that each time you open chalkpad, it will auto sign in, provided that credentials are correct.
Please note that we do not send or share your credentials anywhere, they are just saved within your browser only.
